gpt_gen_product_description: Acerola juice concentrate, clarified R=64-68 from SVZ Tomaszow Sp. z o.o. is a filtered and concentrated juice made from mature acerola fruits. It features a high Brix value between 64 and 68, a pH of 2.7 to 3.5, and retains significant vitamin C content (6000-8000 mg/kg). The concentrate has an aromatic, sweet, and acidic flavor with an orange-yellow color, making it suitable for nutritional and flavor applications. It is microbiologically safe and complies with pesticide regulations, recommended to be stored frozen with a shelf life of 24 months.
